content.new:
Hello,

I have run into a problem using tandem.DataFrame() to read an X!Tandem output file.  In particular, a KeyError is raised at the statement near the end of the above mentioned routine at the statement:

            del protein['peptide']['peptide']

If I wrap this in a try block then I hit another KeyError at 

            info['scan'] = item['support']['fragment ion mass spectrum']['note']

Here is the error message:


```
bash-3.2$ ./CuWm_analysis.py -i foo.xml -f 'X!Tandem'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./CuWm_analysis.py", line 47, in <module>
    sys.exit(main(ns))
  File "./CuWm_analysis.py", line 33, in main
    unprocessed = supported_formats[ns.format].DataFrame(ns.infile)
  File "/opt/local/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/3.6/lib/python3.6/site-packages/pyteomics/tandem.py", line 310, in DataFrame
    del protein['peptide']['peptide']
KeyError: 'peptide'
```
content.old:
Hello,

I have run into a problem using tandem.DataFrame() to read an X!Tandem output file.  In particular, a KeyError is raised at the statement near the end of the above mentioned routine at the statement:

            del protein['peptide']['peptide']

If I wrap this in a try block then I hit another KeyError at 

            info['scan'] = item['support']['fragment ion mass spectrum']['note']

Here is the error message:

bash-3.2$ ./CuWm_analysis.py -i foo.xml -f 'X!Tandem'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "./CuWm_analysis.py", line 47, in <module>
    sys.exit(main(ns))

KeyError: 'peptide'

issue.title: Problems w/ creating DataFrame from X!Tandem file
Problems w/ creating DataFrame from X!Tandem file

message.raw: Please feel free to reopen if this error occurs with the current version.
